author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Chan Emily v Kang Hock Chai Joachim
counsel: Michael Khoo SC, Josephine Low and Andy Chiok (Michael Khoo and Partners) for the plaintiff; Peter Cuthbert Low and Mark Goh (Peter Low Tang and Belinda Ang) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Evidence/Weight of evidence/Plaintiff alleging breach of trust by defendant/Testimony of parties primary evidence in trial/Testimony of parties equally plausible/Whether peripheral and background facts establishing plaintiff's case on balance of probabilities/Relevance of defendant's conduct in criminal proceedings to civil proceedings/When testimony of one witness to be preferred over testimony of another/Section 54 Evidence Act (Cap 97, 1997 Rev Ed)
